content.text: I wish I could take ballet lessons.
I don't know. I'm scared to tell my dad. He's a preacher and I think he'd think it's too feminine.
Well, ballet is a beautiful art form. And it's great exercise. I'm sure it would help you stay in shape.
I know. I've been trying to convince myself to go for it.
You should! I'll even go with you the first time.
Really? That would be great. Thanks.
No problem. I'm always up for trying new things.
Me too. I'm kind of a homebody, but I'm trying to get out more.
That's good. It's important to experience new things.
Yeah. I'm excited to start ballet.
Me too! We should make a date to go.
Sounds good. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
